answerText: Tartuffe, or The Imposter [or Tartuffe, ou l'Imposteur][10] This other Moliere play tells the story of Gorgibus's daughter and niece, Magdelon and Cathos, who reject La Grainge and Du Croisy but fall in love with their disguised valets.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 9 | 2 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This play begins with Madame Pernelle criticizing her grandchildren and telling everyone to follow the title character's example of good behavior. [10] Name this play by Moliere about a man who tries to get Orgon arrested as a traitor despite Cleante's pleas. He ends up getting arrested when it is revealed that the king knew he was a liar.
